H0.text: As at 2012 Goulburn Correctional Centre is considered the highest security prison of which country. United States

H1.text: As at 2012 Goulburn Correctional Centre is considered the highest security prison of which country. United Kingdom

H2.text: As at 2012 Goulburn Correctional Centre is considered the highest security prison of which country. Canada

H3.text: As at 2012 Goulburn Correctional Centre is considered the highest security prison of which country. Straya

A4.text: This was the first such facility in Australia and makes the centre the highest security prison in Australia.

A5.text: It is located in Goulburn, New South Wales, three kilometres north-east of the central business district.
